projects.name: HIIT Hustle
projects.description: A web application designed to help users create and manage their own HIIT workouts, with features for tracking progress and sharing routines.

projects.name: This Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Society Calendar Application for University of Portsmouth
projects.description: A web application for managing society events at the University of Portsmouth, allowing users to view, create, and manage events.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A simple weather application that provides current weather information and forecasts for any location, using a public API and Pyhton back-end.

projects.name: Virtual Cat Shelter
projects.description: A web application that is an imitation of 90s Tamagotchi games which simulates a virtual cat shelter, allowing users to adopt, care for, and interact with virtual cats.
